title: XXX Classic - Behind the Green Door - Marilyn Chambers.full.mpg
description:
Behind the Green Door (1972)
The All-American Girl. 

a XXX all time favorite classic

Mitchell Brothers pooled their considerable talents and resources for the very 
different BEHIND THE GREEN DOOR. Different in its approach to erotica, making a serious bid for highbrow respectability rather than just content to stimulate its audience&#039;s groin area, it was clearly intended to appeal to women as well as men. As a result, the female contingent of its viewer-ship during its initial theatrical run at the brothers&#039; fabled O&#039;Farrell cinema was rumored as being uncharacteristically high. Though exact numbers are nigh impossible to come by, it has also been documented elsewhere that an inordinate amount of female buyers procured the cassette when it was launched on its particularly profitable video career. Supporting the distinction between "rape fantasy" (fuelled by bodice-ripping romance novels) and the disturbing reality, GREEN DOOR details the feature-length subjugation of one woman ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ fair-haired all American girl Gloria Saunders, portrayed by former Ivory Snow model Marilyn Chambers in her indelible adult baptism by fire ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ abducted and taken to an underground sex club where for one night she&#039;s told she will be publicly "loved like she has never been loved before" with freedom returned to her the next morning.
